item.title: Introduction to USgas Package
item.description: Happy to announce that the USgas package is now on CRAN. The package provides an overview of natural gas demand in the US in a time-series format (state and aggregate levels), with more than 100 series. This package is a mirror of the USgrid package that focuses on electricity demand (and supply) in the US. Additional information available: Source code - https://github.
